snippet: Tablets and e-readers have been around for a while, and now there are signs that the F.A.A. is ready to modernize its rules on their use.
abstract: Editorial welcomes recommendations submitted to the Federal Aviation Administration by a committee of experts for new, clearer regulations on the use of electronic devices on planes; contends that since there is a lot of confusion among passengers about why restrictions apply, clarification is a sensible move.
lead_paragraph: Tablets and e-readers have been around for a while, and now there are signs that the F.A.A. is ready to modernize its rules on their use.
